title: How a messianic movement is changing the Israeli military
subhed: Followers of the Hardal movement, a blend of religious fundamentalism and ultranationalism, have begun to make inroads into the military establishment. Their dehumanizing rhetoric toward Palestinians has contributed to the destruction of the Gaza Strip.

title: France summons US ambassador over comments on slain far-right activist
Serge Gainsbourg's forgotten Ukrainian roots
US military buildup around Iran: What satellite images show
subhed: Amid negotiations over Iran's nuclear program, Donald Trump amasses US military assets at bases and in the surrounding seas. Using satellite imagery and other open sources, Le Monde documented an unprecedented deployment.
byline: By Liselotte Mas, Brice Donadille and Fabien Leboucq

title: Karyna Shuliak was Jeffrey Epstein's last partner and main heiress. She won't benefit from his will
subhed: The Belarusian woman met the sexual predator when she was 20 and remained loyal to him until his suicide in prison in 2019.

title: Loulou de Saison, the rising French fashion label, is making its mark
subhed: Chloé Harrouche's brand has won over a growing clientele with its elegant and minimalist wardrobe. Now with two boutiques in Paris, the French designer is gaining ground.

title: General Syrsky, commander of the Ukrainian arm, to Le Monde: 'Russian army losses have exceeded its recruitment level'
subhed: The Ukrainian commander-in-chief told Le Monde that, despite a 'very difficult' situation on the battlefield, his army continued to resist 'the most powerful army in Europe' and to 'foil' Russian military plans.

title: Trump hikes new global tariff rate from 10% to 15%

byline: By Jean-Philippe Rémy (Lyon (France), special correspondent) and Richard Schittly (Lyon (France) correspondent)

title: Documents show Epstein's attempts at connecting with Sarkozy's circle

Rebuked by Supreme Court, Trump touches limit of his power
subhed: Trump's 'reciprocal' tariffs, a major aspect of his agenda, were struck down by the nation's highest court. He also faces mounting criticism over his handling of the Epstein affair and his immigration policy.

title: CEO of Mistral AI says warnings about extreme risks of artificial intelligence are often 'distraction tactics'
subhed: Arthur Mensch stands out for his views on the risks posed by artificial intelligence, which have been voiced by OpenAI CEO Sam Altman and Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei.

title: 'For the British monarchy, the stakes of the Epstein files go far beyond the individual case of a compromised prince'
subhed: The involvement of Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor in the Epstein affair reveals the porous boundaries between public service, private interests and familial loyalties, writes historian Catherine Marshall.
